data.eml:eml: Seven new species of Loneura Navás (Insecta: Psocodea: ‘ Psocoptera’: Ptiloneuridae) from Valle del Cauca, Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nieto, Julián Alexander Mendivil, Aldrete, Alfonso Neri García, Obando, Ranulfo González (2017): Seven new species of Loneura Navás (Insecta: Psocodea: ‘ Psocoptera’: Ptiloneuridae) from Valle del Cauca, Colombia. Zootaxa 4227 (4): 495-523, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4227.4.2
